summary: Inu-Okuri: The Ferocious Meme Coin of the Youkai World! - Welcome to Inu-Okuri (送り犬, lit. "Sending-Off Dog"), the meme coin inspired by the legendary Youkai known for their ferocity and grim aura. Also known as Okuri-Ōkami (送り狼, lit. "Sending-Off Wolf"), these mythical creatures are infamous for their fearsome presence that terrifies even the strongest of Youkai. Inu-Okuri is not just another digital asset; it's a community-driven token designed to bring the mystique and power of Youkai lore into the world of cryptocurrency.
